A Make_from_relationship is a type of established between two instances of . It specifies that, in the context of the definition of the relating part version, the relating part version is considered as resulting from the manufacturing transformation of the related part version.
The related part version may identify a raw material or a semi-finished part.

The quantity is specified when the related part version is a countable material. If the value is absent , it shall be considered that one occurrence of the related part version is used to produce the relating part version.
